meanings.definition: A group of islands in the South Pacific.
meanings.sent1: The explorer visited the beautiful tongas in the South Pacific.
meanings.sent2: Many tourists dream of exploring the tongas in the South Pacific.
meanings.sent3: The tongas in the South Pacific must be the perfect place for a relaxing vacation.
meanings.sent4: The tongas in the South Pacific are like jewels scattered in the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The lush greenery and crystal-clear waters of the tongas in the South Pacific are breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional Polynesian dance.
meanings.sent1: The dancers performed a mesmerizing tongas at the festival.
meanings.sent2: The tongas is a significant part of Polynesian culture.
meanings.sent3: Everyone was amazed by the energetic tongas performance.
meanings.sent4: The tongas seemed to tell a story through graceful movements.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic beats of the tongas echoed through the village square.

meanings.sent1: The tongas trotted along the cobblestone streets with elegance.
meanings.sent2: In the olden days, people used tongas for transportation.
meanings.sent3: The tongas driver had a big smile as he guided the carriage.
meanings.sent4: The tongas glided through the town like a royal chariot.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hooves clattering on the ground signaled the arrival of the tongas.
